name: Year-end Collections
query:
SELECT 
    MONTHNAME(date) AS "Month:Data:120",
    SUM(all_grand_total) as 'Total Collection:Currency:120',
   -- COUNT(*) AS 'Record Count:Int:100',
    SUM(all_tithes_total) as 'Tithes:Currency:120',
    SUM(all_offering_total) as 'Offering:Currency:120', 
    SUM(all_mission_total) as 'Mission:Currency:120',
    SUM(all_benevolence_total) as 'Benevolence:Currency:120',
    SUM(all_loose_total) as 'Loose:Currency:120',
    SUM(sunday_school_collection) as 'Sunday School:Currency:120'
FROM `tabCollection`
WHERE YEAR(date) = 2025
GROUP BY MONTHNAME(date)
ORDER BY MONTH(date)
